subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Ted Ligety, Kjetil Jansrud and Lindsey Vonn are just a few of the big names converging on the Vail Valley in Colorado for the start of the two-week Alpine World Ski Championships.
snippet: Ted Ligety, Kjetil Jansrud and Lindsey Vonn are just a few of the big names converging on the Vail Valley in Colorado for the start of the two-week Alpine World Ski Championships.
